messages.messageBody:
rurouni575 wrote:

> Hello, my name is Lucas Schwartze. I am a college student at
> Washington University in St. Louis and I was wondering if anyone could
> please help me find some scholarly sources about the Shinsengumi for a
> paper I am working on. Thank you very much in advance, Lucas.

Try here:

http://www.samurai.or.id/php/modules.php?name=Web_Link&l_op=viewlink&cid=6

Totok Sudarijanto
http://www.mjer.org
email: totok.sudarijanto@...

"the ultimate aim of martial arts is not having to use them"

messages.subject: Research Help
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, my name is Lucas Schwartze.  I am a college student at Washington University in St. Louis and I was wondering if anyone could please help me find some
messages.messageBody:
Hello, my name is Lucas Schwartze. I am a college student at
Washington University in St. Louis and I was wondering if anyone could
please help me find some scholarly sources about the Shinsengumi for a
paper I am working on. Thank you very much in advance, Lucas.
